DOC.brief_title: Education With Without Exercise Counseling Preventing Lymphedema Women With Stage I , Stage II , Stage III Breast Cancer Who Are Undergoing Axillary Lymph Node Dissection
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . To test , group randomize control trial , efficacy program versus education reduce incidence lymphedema . II . To compare severity lymphedema , term change arm circumference site great difference continuous variable two intervention . III . To assess agreement patient ' self-report swelling ( mild , moderate , severe ) extent circumferential measurement difference treat side contralateral arm site great difference . IV . To compare health-related quality life ( Factional Assessment Cancer Therapy-Breast [ FACT-B ] +4 score ) two intervention . V. To characterize adherence lymphedema prevention exercise , lymphedema knowledge , range motion . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Six week surgery , patient receive brief initial post-operative care session describe lymphedema risk prevention oral instruction write material . Patients complete physical assessment questionnaires 6 week 6 , 12 , 18 month . Patients also contact telephone 9 15 month . ARM II : Patients receive lymphedema education complete physical assessment questionnaires Arm I . Patients also complete personalized physical therapy intervention , receive refrigerator magnet , 15-minute video reinforces information exercise .
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria : Newly diagnose stage IIII cancer female breast No prior history carcinoma situ , lobular carcinoma situ ( LCIS ) , ductal carcinoma situ ( DCIS ) , invasive breast cancer * Patients history invasive malignancy eligible long complete treatment 5 year postdiagnosis ; patient basal cell squamous cell cancer skin eligible Neoadjuvant therapy Patients schedule receive type radiation therapy breast axilla eligible ; however , must register study presurgery measure take prior receive neoadjuvant therapy Patients schedule receive neoadjuvant chemotherapy also eligible ; however , must register study presurgery measurement take prior receive neoadjuvant therapy Patients receive neoadjuvant therapy eligible May enrol treatment trial ; however , patient enrol surgery trial one treatment arm full axillary node dissection eligible ; NOTE : Patients enrol American College Surgeons Oncology Group ( ACOSOG ) Z1071 eligible participate study ; patient concurrently enrol study ACOSOGZ1071 , may also enrol ACOSOGZ1071 lymphedema substudy No document cardiac conduction disturbance , unstable angina , dementia , chronic disease , opinion treat physician , significantly increase mortality next 2 year No diagnosed lymphedema In order properly fit elastic sleeve , eligible patient must arm measurement axilla , elbow , wrist fall within range one six sleeve size Not currently homebound dependent upon walker wheelchair mobility Able participate mild exercise program Willing return study site duration study ( 18 month ) Sentinel ( SND ) full axillary node dissection ( AND ) ( minimum number node require ) Patients double mastectomy , axillary node dissection and/or radiation arm ineligible ; patient undergo treatment ( i.e. , surgery and/or radiation ) contralateral arm registration Step 2 still eligible remain study ; however , document appropriately form C1628 conclusion study participation
